text: Tumi ki tadera dekha ni yara kapatacarana karache, -- tara granthadharidera madhyera yara abisbasa posana kare tadera temana bha'i- bandhudera bale -- ''tomadera yadi bera kare de'oya haya tahale amara'o niscaya'i tomadera sange beriye yaba, ara tomadera byapare amara karora tabedari kakhano karaba na, ara tomadera sange yadi yud'dha kara haya tahale amara niscaya'i tomadera sahayya karabaâ€™â€™? Ara allah saksya dicchena ye tara niscaya'i mithyabadi.
